function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Firms resisting the use of accommodative signals in communication","Impact":"Reduced stock price and brand value, increased lawsuits","Mitigation":"Encouraging firms to use authentic accommodative signals and facing penalties for deploying bluffs","Technologies":"Communication strategies and authenticity verification mechanisms","People":"Firms, external entities, shareholders, customers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry associations, and firms themselves"}]}
